channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Backup Managed Maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 27, 08:00 UTC  -  Jan 31, 16:00 UTC

Jan 14, 22:39 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 27/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 31/01/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Backup and restoration will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our team will carry out maintenance on the Veeam Backup Managed service.

Thank you for your understanding.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vCenter Server services.
An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification
item.description:
Jan 16, 16:15 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational. There has been no impact since 16/01/2025 16:00 UTC

Jan 15, 08:30 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 15, 08:30 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 15, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jan 9, 12:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 15/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/01/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their host(s).

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Vsphere management incident notification
item.description:
Jan 15, 16:01 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that this incident has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 14/01/2025 09:34 UTC
End time : 15/01/2025 15:21 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 15, 15:16 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our hosted private cloud on managed vSphere offer.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 14/01/2025 09:34 UTC
Impacted Services : The vSphere management access is currently unreachable on hosted private cloud with IAM enabled
Customers Impact : Customers with IAM enabled may encounter management access issues on vSphere management.
No impact on customers workload.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are working diligently to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 15, 14:33 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident impacting our hosted private cloud on managed vSphere offer.

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible.
As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Cluster9800
item.description:
Jan 13, 13:54 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/01/2025 06:12 UTC
End Time : 13/01/2025 06:20 UTC
Technical impact : RBX2D
Service impact : Cluster 9800 were temporarily inaccessible, the datastores hosted on this cluster were also unavailable.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
Root cause : Incident due to an hardware issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Cluster 10071
item.description:

End Time : 04/01/2025 10:45 UTC
Technical impact : RBX8
Service impact : We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.
Root cause : Incident due to an issue on a cooling system module.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Jan 4, 08:48 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting the availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 04/01/2025 07:05 UTC
Technical impact : RBX8
Service impact : We are currently facing an issue with Cluster 10071, which is temporarily inaccessible, the datastores hosted on this cluster are also unavailable.
Root cause : Incident due to an issue on a cooling system module.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working diligently to implement a solution, and we will keep you informed of any developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Cluster 10071

item.title: [GLOBAL][Hosted Private Cloud] - SSL Gateway maintenance notification
item.description:

Dec 16, 16:00 UTC

Dec 10, 22:53 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 16/12/2024 16:00 UTC
End time : 20/12/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : vCenter will be temporarily unavailable for 2 hours during the operation.
Impacted customers will be directly informed by mail.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will perform an operation on deployments of the GatewaySSL VMs.
Please note that you can reschedule this migration by your own.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [CA/FR][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Maintenance

End time : 17/12/2024 15:00 UTC
All services are operational again.

Dec 16, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 15, 08:55 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 16/12/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/12/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Enterprise service will be unavailable during operations.
Maintenance will begin with Canada on 16/12/2024 13:00 UTC and in France, it will begin on 17/12/2024 at 10:00 UTC.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Veeam Enterprise.

Thank you for your understanding.

Thank you for your understanding.
